channel.title: Project oblivion - re start up2date - plz comment
channel.description:
hello, me and a couplfe of mates have been playing servers now for a couple of month and i suggested, why dont we make our own server?, so we all agreed and we have been working on it for a couple of days now. this is my 1st server. so dont be too harsh __________________________________________________________________________ SERVER __________________________________________________________________________ base: deltascape ( yh i no, deltascape...get over it )
things i have added:
recoded deltas teleports. (dont believe me ask delta himself) fixed npc noclipping in certain areas. fixed ags spec. (max hit now 70) fixed mage bow spec (now hits eg= 21 19 pretty rapid on most specs) added karils bow spec. added grand-exchange with 2 glitchs fixed ( 2 glitchs left ) made barrage multi. (it hits all around you but only freezes the player you casted on ) made burst multi. (same as above) d claws 4 specs on npcs and players. deleted all shops added npc dialogue. for new npcs ( made it so u dnt auto get starter, u speak to lumby guide he says he welcome etc, i take it u r new, here take this starter, and sets ur starter to 1, if you speak to him again he says hey! i hope ur enjoying ur stay etc etc )
things still to add:
2 more teleports to add fix npc noclipping where ever theres npcs (20%) make k bow hit npcs (did it but it looked fked up, so ima re do it) re make auto spawn (5%) remake npc drops (5%) fix up pest control (0%) remake slayer (20%) make barrage freeze all around caster add items to rest of shops, 3 shops left
__________________________________________________________________________ video (watch full screen) __________________________________________________________________________
http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=6o3m04&s=5

item.title: Project oblivion - re start up2date - plz comment
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.description:
@i_nelson_i wrote:

hello, me and a couplfe of mates have been playing servers now for a couple of month and i suggested, why dont we make our own server?, so we all agreed and we have been working on it for a couple of days now. this is my 1st server. so dont be too harsh

SERVER

base: deltascape ( yh i no, deltascape…get over it )

things i have added:

recoded deltas teleports. (dont believe me ask delta himself)
fixed npc noclipping in certain areas.
fixed ags spec. (max hit now 70)
fixed mage bow spec (now hits eg= 21 19 pretty rapid on most specs)
added karils bow spec.
added grand-exchange with 2 glitchs fixed ( 2 glitchs left )
made barrage multi. (it hits all around you but only freezes the player you casted on )
made burst multi. (same as above)
d claws 4 specs on npcs and players.
deleted all shops
added npc dialogue. for new npcs ( made it so u dnt auto get starter, u speak to lumby guide he says he welcome etc, i take it u r new, here take this starter, and sets ur starter to 1, if you speak to him again he says hey! i hope ur enjoying ur stay etc etc )

things still to add:

2 more teleports to add
fix npc noclipping where ever theres npcs (20%)
make k bow hit npcs (did it but it looked fked up, so ima re do it)
re make auto spawn (5%)
remake npc drops (5%)
fix up pest control (0%)
remake slayer (20%)
make barrage freeze all around caster
add items to rest of shops, 3 shops left

video (watch full screen)

http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=6o3m04&s=5

Read full topic
